food_description: A rich, savory ramen bowl with spicy garlic broth, tender pork slices, and soft-boiled egg.
Classic Italian risotto made with Arborio rice, fresh mushrooms, parmesan, and white wine.
Juicy, spiced tandoori chicken served with mint chutney, naan, and mixed salad.
Assorted sushi rolls, sashimi, and pickled sides served in a traditional bento box.
Crispy corn tortillas filled with seasoned beef, salsa verde, onions, and cilantro.
